stimulusHtml: Let h be the function defined by  h( x )= ∫ π/4 x sin 2 t dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@49C3@ . Which of the following is an equation for the line tangent to the graph of h at the point where x= π 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AE0@ ?
choicesHtml: y= 2 x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A15@

y=x− π 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CCB@

y = 1 2 ( x − π 4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4038@

y=( 2 2 )( x− π 4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4225@
